attributes.action: Graham's Law - Legislate against Fake news.
attributes.additional_details: To demonstrate to the UK population that you can protect the public and legislate against Fake, speculative and scaremongering news output by Main Stream Media.
attributes.background: Create legislation that supports free speech but punishes MSM  by £10,000 fine each time they publish fake news. The main stream media have had a demoralising impact on the UK population during the Covid Pandemic and only fear of financial penalties will prevent repeat occurrences.
